welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Penrith, the charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and adventurous activities. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that this city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sydney Bankstown Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sydney Bankstown Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Sydney Kingsford Smith Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights, with a focus on low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A modern terminal serving domestic and regional flights, with a variety of shopping and dining options.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a 3-hour time limit per session.
